description:
Dr. Bronner’s has been doing it right for decades. What’s "it" you ask? In this case, the answer is an all-natural and unscented baby soap that’s well-suited for sensitive skin. Just dilute a few drops on a wet wash cloth, lather, and avoid the eyes for a tear-free clean at bath time.

  • Formulation is fragrance-free with double the olive oil of standard Br. Bronner's soap
  • Biodegradable
  • Made with organic and certified fair trade ingredients
  • Bottle is made from 100% recycled materials
  • Concentrated. A few drops into a washcloth is all that's needed
  • Not tear-free. Keep out of baby's eyes
name: Dr. Bronner's Pure-Castile Baby Unscented Liquid Soap 59ml

specs.key: Suitable for use in salt water
